name: Ancient Apparition
title: Kaldr
lore: Kaldr, the Ancient Apparition, is an image projected from outside time. He springs from the cold, infinite void that both predates the universe and awaits its end.

coldFeet.name: Cold Feet
coldFeet.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy. Unless they move away, they become frozen and stunned.

iceVortex.name: Ice Vortex
iceVortex.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows enemies and increases magic damage they take.

chillingTouch.name: Chilling Touch
chillingTouch.description: Adds a chilling effect to attacks, dealing bonus magic damage and slowing attack speed.

iceBless.name: Ice Blast
iceBless.description: Launches a tracer that creates an expanding ice blast at its location. Enemies hit cannot heal and shatter if their health drops too low.
